pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, November 22, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Estonia, Alar Karis.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
